title: Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies and Brie Fondue

Ingredients.1: 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies® Smoked Sausage, divided

Ingredients.6: 1 (8 ounce) wheel Brie cheese, rind removed and cheese diced

Ingredients.12: 1 small French baguette, sliced 1/4 inch thick and toasted

Directions.1: Chop 8 Lit'l Smokies smoked sausages and reserve the rest. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, heat chopped smoked sausages in olive oil with garlic until just browned.

Directions.2: Add white wine and milk. In a separate bowl, toss the brie and Cheddar cheeses with flour, thoroughly coat. Slowly whisk cheese mixture into the saucepan. Continue to whisk until smooth and thick, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.

Directions.3: Saute the remaining smoked sausages in a skillet until browned. Serve warm fondue with Lit'l Smokies smoked sausages, apple slices and toasted baguette. Drizzle fondue and apples with honey.
